Title: Family
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Monday, 06-Jan-97 21:28:36 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 1441 Last-Modified: Sunday, 06-Oct-96 05:16:24 GMT Family Family Landrum Family The name Landrum is derived from a farm in Aberdeenshire, the name of which -- Lendrum -- in Gaelic is spelled leith-an druim and means a field on the side of a ridge or a broad ridge.
